com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.jdk

Class BaseJdkHttpAccessor<K extends EntryKey>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.Loggable
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.jdk.BaseJdkHttpAccessor<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JdkHttpContentDeleter, JdkHttpContentGetter, JdkHttpContentHeader, JdkHttpContentPutter, JdkHttpEntryLister

    public abstract class BaseJdkHttpAccessor<K extends EntryKey>
extends Loggable
    Intermediate base class used by accessors that use Async HTTP Client library for HTTP Access.
